Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BroadcastContent
    Represents a broadcastable content.
    Transformer<T extends BroadcastContent>
    Classes implementing this interface can be used to transform internal server state changes, based on connection specific tags.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastContentManager<C extends BroadcastContent>
    The Broadcast Content Manager (BCM) maintains a reference to the current content state (Broadcast Content).
    BroadcastContentManagerTest
    Tests the BroadcastContentManager, notably the latch for unblocking on asynchronous changes.
    ContentUpdateResponseGeneratorTest
    Test the ARLs timeout behavior (return code) and burst messages.
    EraserTransformer
    Nonsense transformer that reduces any message to the emptystring, unless it contains the received tag.
    HashedUpdateTest  
    IdentityTransformerTest
    Tests whether the identity transformator correctly handles input (should not modify any fields).
    ResponseGenerator
    The ResponseGenerator provides notifications about status changes registered by a provided BroadcastContentManager.
    StringBroadcastContent
    Sample content for the Junit tests.
    StringResponseCollectingClient
    Imitates a client who buffers all received updates.
    Terminator
    Waiting clients should be unblocks if the BCM is terminated asynchronously.
    TransformedUpdateTest  
    UnserializableBroadcastContent
    Class with inner cyclical dependency (references itself).
    UnserializableTest
    Tests the JsonProcessingException in BroadcastContentHasher by feeding an object with cyclical dependencies.
    ZapperTransformer
    Erases all messages ans always returns the empty string.
